description:

title: (self-documentation) doc/api_samples/all_extensions/extensions-get-resp.json contain broken links

comments.content:

comments.content: sorry to ask , but what is broken links ? looks to me it's only a namespace, not a valid like ,right?

comments.content: Yes, but I expect them to work. Any URL should works...

comments.content: I was told it's not that case ... but I think if we can offer a valid link should be a good enhancement

comments.content: I found a page that I believe might contain all of the new, unbroken links. Does anyone know if this link is the accurate link to replace the first link above with?  http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref-compute-v2-ext.html#os-rescue
